sentence: Among the underlying components of the Russell 3000 index, we saw noteworthy options trading volume today in Salesforce.com Inc (Symbol: CRM), where a total of 22,291 contracts have traded so far, representing approximately 2.2 million underlying shares.
That amounts to about 68.2% of CRM's average daily trading volume over the past month of 3.3 million shares.
Particularly high volume was seen for the $87.50 strike put option expiring March 16, 2018 , with 1,613 contracts trading so far today, representing approximately 161,300 underlying shares of CRM.

Below is a chart showing CRM's trailing twelve month trading history, with the $87.50 strike highlighted in orange:

RH (Symbol: RH) options are showing a volume of 7,700 contracts thus far today.
That number of contracts represents approximately 770,000 underlying shares, working out to a sizeable 63.7% of RH's average daily trading volume over the past month, of 1.2 million shares.
Especially high volume was seen for the $60 strike put option expiring January 19, 2018 , with 2,500 contracts trading so far today, representing approximately 250,000 underlying shares of RH.

Below is a chart showing RH's trailing twelve month trading history, with the $60 strike highlighted in orange:

And Rambus Inc. (Symbol: RMBS) options are showing a volume of 5,704 contracts thus far today.
That number of contracts represents approximately 570,400 underlying shares, working out to a sizeable 62.9% of RMBS's average daily trading volume over the past month, of 906,685 shares.
Particularly high volume was seen for the $14 strike call option expiring January 19, 2018 , with 3,503 contracts trading so far today, representing approximately 350,300 underlying shares of RMBS.

Below is a chart showing RMBS's trailing twelve month trading history, with the $14 strike highlighted in orange:

For the various different available expirations for CRM options , RH options , or RMBS options , visit StockOptionsChannel.com.
